DESCRIPTION: Adopted by City Council ordinance or resolution, these policies have a binding effect or serve as mandatory approval criteria for future decision making.
Adopted by City Council ordinance or resolution, these policies express the Council's opinion but do not have a binding effect or serve as mandatory approval criteria for future decision making.

TYPE_NAME: Administrative Rules Adopted by City Council (ARC)
DESCRIPTION: Adopted by City Council Ordinance or Resolution, these rules are binding requirements, regulations, or procedures which affect citizens or all City employees.

TYPE_NAME: Administrative Rules Adopted by Bureaus Pursuant to Rule Making Authority (ARB)
DESCRIPTION: Adopted by the Bureau pursuant to authority expressly delegated by City Council, these are binding requirements, regulations, or procedures which affect citizens or all City employees.
